Title da collection view where are shown the saved words in 'saved games' view
No button on alert popup that cancel the saving process.
Yes button on alert popup that save the game and overwrite the other with the same name.

trans-unit.source: You already have a game with this name. Do you want to overwrite it?
trans-unit.target: Você já tem um jogo salvo com este nome. Deseja sobrescrevê-lo?
trans-unit.note: Alert message saying that there is game with the same name and asking if the user wants to overwrite it.
Alert title asking if the user wants to overwrite the game with the same name.
Cancel action button on alert popup that asks if the user wants to save a new game.
Save button on alert popup that asks if the user wants to save a new game.

trans-unit.target: Dê um nome para este jogo

TextField placeholder to the game name
Alert title asking if the user wants to save the new game

No button on alert popup that cancel the saving process.
Yes button on alert popup that save the game and overwrite the other with the same name.

trans-unit.source: Give a name for this new game

trans-unit.note: Alert message when is saving a new game saying the user to give a name to this game
TextField placeholder to the game name
Alert title asking if the user wants to save the new game
Message informing the user that if he returns, he will stop and cancel the game.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to exit?
trans-unit.note: Ask the user if he wants to go back and cancel the game.
Button to cancel the action of returning.
Button to continue the action of returning to home screen and cancel the game.

trans-unit.source:
Privacy Policy:
This application is designed for children under the age of 13. All content created through the application is the entirely responsibility of its users.
Data Collect:
We take photos and use the microphone only with the purpose of fulfilling the main functionality of the application.
Security:
We use standard internal security protocols to protect your personal information.
User control:
The application allows the user to access and delete his data.
Location:
We do not register or share your location.
This application does not have:
- Advertising - Analytics
For more information, contact us: contato@linguadegatoapp.com.br
trans-unit.target:
Política de Privacidade:
Este aplicativo foi projetado para menores de 13 anos. Todo conteúdo criado através do aplicativo é de total responsabilidade de seus usuários.
Coleta de dados:
Coletamos fotos e utilizamos o microfone para gravação de áudio com o objetivo cumprir a funcionalidade principal da aplicação.
Segurança:
Utilizamos os protocolos de segurança internos padrão para que suas informações pessoais não sejam acessadas ou alteradas.
Controle do usuário:
O aplicativo permite ao usuário acessar, alterar e/ou apagar seus dados.
Localização:
Nós não registramos ou compartilhamos a sua localização.
Este aplicativo não possui:
- Propaganda - Analytics
Para mais informações, entre em contato conosco: contato@linguadegatoapp.com.br
trans-unit.note: Message of the privacy policy popup
Alert message informing the user to create new game before play.

trans-unit.source: You don't have any saved words yet
trans-unit.target: Você ainda não tem palavras salvas
trans-unit.note: Alert title informing the user that he cant click on play game button because there isnt any saved word yet.

trans-unit.source: All content created within this application is the entire responsibility of its users.
trans-unit.target: Todo o conteúdo criado neste aplicação é de inteira responsabilidade dos seus usuários.
trans-unit.note: Message informing that the content of the application is the responsibility of the user
Ok button that close the alert
Title of an alert popup that appears when the user first use the app
Title that will appear on the first page of the tutorial
Title that will appear on the second page of the tutorial
Title that will appear on the eighth page of the tutorial

trans-unit.source: The new words will be lost.
trans-unit.target: As palavras novas não salvas serão perdidas.
trans-unit.note: Message informing the user that if he returns, he will lose the words added to this new game.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to go back?
trans-unit.target: Você tem certeza que deseja voltar?
trans-unit.note: Ask the user if he wants to go back and cancel the creation of a new game.
Asks if the user wants to delete new clue when he is creating a new game.
Respond negatively if the user wants to delete new clue.
Respond positively if the user wants to delete new clue.
Button to close error message popup

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there as an error. Please, contact us.
trans-unit.target: Desculpe, houve um erro. Entre em contato conosco.
trans-unit.note: Messagem informing that there was a problem and saing the user to contact us
Short messagem informing that there was a problem and the game was not saved
Ok and close popup.
Short message informing that the game was saved successfully.

trans-unit.source: You already have a game with this name. Do you want to overwrite it?
trans-unit.target: Você já tem um jogo salvo com este nome. Deseja sobrescrevê-lo?
trans-unit.note: Message informing the user that there is a game saved with the same name and asking if he whants to save the game anyway and overwrite the other game.
Responds negatively to the question whether the user wants to overwrite the game and cancel the action of saving the new game.
Short message asking the user if he wants to overwrite a game.
Responds positively to the question whether the user wants to overwrite the game that has the same name and continue the action of saving the new game.
Cancel action
Continue action and delete the clue from the new game

trans-unit.source: Do you want to delete this word?
trans-unit.target: Você gostaria de apagar esta palavra?
trans-unit.note: Asks the user if he wants to delete a clue from the new game.
Continue the insertion of the new clue.
Alert answer to go to game even if it will cancel the insertion of a new clue to the new game.

trans-unit.source: The new clue will not be added in the game.
trans-unit.target: A nova dica não será adicionada ao jogo
trans-unit.note: This is the alert message when the user is craeting a new game, click on Play button and there is a new clue to be added in the game.

trans-unit.source: You didn't finish adding the clue
trans-unit.target: Você não terminou de adicionar a dica
trans-unit.note: This is the alert title when the user is craeting a new game, click on Play button and there is a new clue to be added in the game.
Cancel the action of saving the new game
Go to action and save the new game
Default text that will appear on the game name text field during alert popup when the user is saving a new game

trans-unit.source: Give a name for this game:
trans-unit.target: Dê um nome para este jogo:
trans-unit.note: Alert that appears when the user wants to save a new game and asks the user to give a name for this game.
Button to cancel the action of returning.
Button to continue the action of returning to home screen and cancel the creation of a new game.
Button to cancel the action of deleting game.
Button to continue the action and delete game.

trans-unit.source: The selected words will be deleted from your list and from your saved games.
trans-unit.target: As palavras selecionadas serão apagadas da sua lista e dos jogos salvos
trans-unit.note: Message informing the user that only the game will be deleted (not the words).
Ask the user if he wants to go delete words.
Button to cancel the action of deleting game.

trans-unit.source: The selected game will be deleted, but its words will remain in your list of words.
trans-unit.target: O jogo será apagado, mas as palavras permanecerão na sua lista de palavras.
trans-unit.note: Message informing the user that only the game will be deleted (not the words).
Ask the user if he wants to go remove the game.
Button to continue the action and delete game.
